attributes.review: I decided to get this app to what good things Donald Trump was doing for this country and it made me pay 50 dollars for the apps and I also don’t want our president having the ability to contact me. Thanks but no thanks.
attributes.title: Trump 2016 not 2020

attributes.review: before you download this app to try to support the president, lets get into some things that make him look not very good. first of all, his nudes have been leaked. (and it’s really small). so if you are not cool having a president with a small weewee, that’s a reason not to vote for him. also, where is the wall he was talking about. nonexistent. this has tripled the country’s national dept. and lastly, he is racist, sexist, and a pervert. so yea, i don’t recommend this app.
attributes.title: trump is a clown

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it made my phone glitch out like crazy!! Do not download this! Save yourself three hours and having to turn your phone on an off!!
attributes.title: So glitchy!

attributes.review: Mr. orange Cheetos face scared me😓😓😓and giant rats came to my house because they were against trump and they tried to eat me😖then I decided to join them✨because Donald trump is a tad bit cooky being a racist and all🥴 so as I have said, this app is scary, deadly, and wrong!!! 😭😡so DONT use it😤😤I rest my case😌💅
attributes.title: ICKYYY💅🧚

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app thinking it was a great app to support our wonderful pedi- president! But not to this trump supporter, it is awful and it doesn’t work. Download a different app instead. 
Ps: Black Lives Matter!!
attributes.title: Didn’t work- Black Lives Matter

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was like dlc for subway surfers. But instead I had read about an ✨orange✨. Like he wasn’t even a playable character and all of his costumes were horrible 0/10. No❤️
attributes.title: Not subway surfers 😡😡😤😤😖😖

attributes.review: after waiting SO long for this to download it kept logging me out of the app and then it was glitching every minute to a scary orange creature that scared not only me but my little brother 👿 please remove not safe at all!
attributes.title: ✨horrible✨🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could learn about Trump and someone stole my phone number and ran my bill up $700. Plus there is untrue information. Horrible. My grandma got cancer after I showed her this app. Please delete this app.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I was hoping to educate myself I try to find something that would make me and my family want to vote but that was not the case this app is 🤮disgusting and 🙄disappointing this made me 🤬hate the president even more.✨✨✨🧚🏻‍♀️❤️

this app literally makes me want to vomit. it’s such a terrible app. i don’t understand why this Cheeto puff is out president. actually no i’m sorry, that’s disrespectful to Cheetos. He is such a sexist, racist, white supremacists that believes he is better than everyone else.
